title: AI-Powered Chatbot
description: A sophisticated chatbot built with Next.js and OpenAI API, featuring natural language processing and context-aware responses.
longDescription: This project demonstrates the integration of modern web technologies with artificial intelligence. The chatbot uses OpenAI's GPT API to provide intelligent, context-aware responses to user queries. Built with Next.js 15, it features a responsive design, real-time messaging, and conversation history management.

title: Advanced Task Manager
description: A full-stack task management application with real-time collaboration, drag-and-drop functionality, and team workspaces.
longDescription: A comprehensive project management solution that combines modern web technologies to create an intuitive and powerful task management experience. Features include real-time collaboration, customizable workflows, and advanced analytics.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: A modern e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.
longDescription: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. Includes user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and a comprehensive admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and customers.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for data analysis with real-time charts, filtering capabilities, and export functionality.
longDescription: A comprehensive data visualization tool that transforms complex datasets into interactive, meaningful charts and graphs. Features real-time data updates, advanced filtering options, and multiple export formats for business intelligence needs.
